attributes.action: Ask Hungarian Government to accept Humanitarian aid, UNHCR support for refugees.
attributes.additional_details: This is based on the information presented both across traditional media and also the social media account of Rebecca Harms - president of the greens in the European Parliament.
attributes.background: There is a lack of water, sanitation, food, shelter and medical aid for refugees in Budapest's train station. At the same time, the Hungarian Government are refusing to accept humanitarian aid and rejecting UNHCR support.
